name: Lauren Ross
byline: Lauren Ross, AKA La Louma, (Los Angeles, CA) is a classically trained multi-instrumentalist, singer, and producer with a soulful queer-punk ethos. A former woodwind and brass player for St. Vincent, in Nov 2017 she released her debut LP, which OUT Magazine called a powerfully relatable 10-track breakout and Billboard heralded as â€œcatchy and cool, but drenched with a call to action.
